ygData.subject: Re: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, well i didn t play EQ last night so I din t actually read the new patch for myself, but I was on Battlecom with a friend who read it to me. Am I under the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, well i didn't play EQ last night so I din't actually read the new patch
for myself, but I was on Battlecom with a friend who read it to me. Am I
under the correct assumption that they nerfed our buffs?? I am told that
they do not last nearly as long as they used to. This Whole new patch from
my understanding is the icing on the cake for Verant, they really get first
prize for F@#$ing the game up.

All of the High level clerics who have ever hunted in Sol B or L Guk, or
have helped a Paladin friend kill Sir Lucan, knows what its like buffing to
prepare for these events. ok so now our buffs don't last half as long as
they did and if you don't have a manastone or an enchanter, that leaves us
pretty much screwed. the time it takes to regain mana after buffing, you
will have to start buffing over again. Verant does everything they possibly
can to screw with each class and the success people have in the game.

I feel extremely sorry for the druids and the necromancers of the game, i
know everyone has their own opinions about kiting, but lets face it, this is
what these classes do, now they have screwed up DOTs, they have made SoW
only last like 10 minutes instead of about 25,I bet they f$%^ed up snare as
well, and they nerfed all the pets.

Ok and the KING of all Verants high and mighty decisions. LETS NOT FIX A
PROBLEM LETS JUST MAKE SOMETHING ELSE WORSE. Point in case, The Box of
Abu'kar 100% weight reduction, Verants code F'd up and lvl 6 mobs were
dropping them in Butcherblock or something similiar, SO the almighty Verant
instead of Fixing the damn goblins went and Changed the Box. Beware if you
are a meleeist with a variety of weapons when you log into the Game you will
be encumbered. I think it was quite nice of them to change the box from
100% to a measly 10%. SO hence don't fix the problem just screw everyone
over.

<braces herself for a rippin>
Let the Flames begin,
Bree Wyndsdale
46th nerfed cleric of Fennin Ro
